channel.title: Ranging glitch? [REQ]
channel.description:
ok when i shoot arrows they go on floor 1 in each pile, they dont go into same pile -.-
REP++ if u can help :( need this badly cuz its kinda bad 4 my server, so some1 plz help :(
been trying 2 fix this and it duzn't work
